question: Scenario: You are learning HTML for the first time and want to create your first web page. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Welcome Heading: Welcome to HTML Paragraph: This is my first HTML program
sampleInput:
Title => Welcome
Heading => Welcome to HTML
Paragraph => This is my first HTML program
answer:
Welcome to HTML

This is my first HTML program
sampleOutput:
Welcome to HTML

This is my first HTML program
description: Create a simple HTML page with a specific title, heading, and paragraph.
